name: Argent Knight: Artemis
notes:
Blessing of Starfire

1st priority if lower gear level.

Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter (Nexus)

Can be picked by advanced players.

Old Dreams Again, Days Gone

Either pick Days Gone or enhance Old Dreams Again

Eden

If nexus is unlocked, don't use ultimate.

Echo of Gold (Nexus)

For Lee Thales Lee users.

name: Bright Knight: Excelsis
notes:
Homeland and Friends

If lacking impair/breach.

name: Dea Anchora
notes:
Letter, Maniac, and Ravings / Recitatif of Birds

When core is unlocked, choose either for damage reduction.

Griseo

Can also pick Aponia' enhanced signet First, No Betrayal.The priority of Aponia signets is the same as griseo.

name: Fallen Rosemary
notes:
Kalpas

Griseo signets can also work with Grey & Empty, Red & Hot, and Yellow & Warm.

name: Herrscher of Flamescion
notes:
Blessing of Starfire

1st priority if lower gear level.

Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter (Nexus)

Can be picked by advanced players.

Old Dreams Again, Go with the Flow

Either pick Go with the Flow or enhance Old Dreams Again

Eden

If nexus is unlocked, don't use ultimate.

Echo of Gold (Nexus)

For Lee Thales Lee users.

name: Herrscher of Reason
notes:
If unable to get double signets on 4F, can consider double elysia and Setsuna Blade: Sakura ni Maku (Nexus).

Setsuna Blade: Yasha (Nexus)

For SS and above rank users.

Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

name: Herrscher of Sentience
notes:
If there's no Normal Signet of Gold +2 stage effect, can pick Blessing of Victory, Blessing of Ego, and Infinity signet at start.

Motto of Asavakkhaya

Recommended to upgrade.

Shining Like Stars (Nexus)

If fighting agains 12F boss.

name: Herrscher of Thunder
notes:
Pardofelis

After getting Kalpas and Eden signets, in late shop buy her signets listed above, and try to maintain 1k silver.

name: Infinite Ouroboros
notes:
Mobius

Don't pick Burning Like Flames.

Old Dreams Again

Recommended to upgrade.

Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

name: Luna Kindred
signetTable: You Shall Be Subject to Numerous Disciplines (Nexus)
notes:
Path, Misfortune, and Written Fate

Recommended to upgrade.

name: Midnight Absinthe
notes:
If there' a Normal Signet of Gold +2 stage effect, start with Eden signets.

Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

name: Miss Pink Elf
notes:
Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

Soldiers, Scissors, Spoils, and Slaughter (Nexus)

Resurrect once at the start of each floor to activate the bonus.

Homeland and Friends

If not enough breach.

name: Prinzessin der Verurteilung
notes:
Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

Kalpas

Only pick his signets after 12F.

name: Reverist Calico
signetTable: Empty Dreams, Self, Set, and Joy (Nexus)
notes:
Can pick kevin's signet Artifact of the Inhibitor to supplement breach.

Griseo

If the starting eden signets don't do enough damage, pick Black & Dark and Red & Hot at start.

name: Silverwing N-EX
notes:
Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

name: Spina Astera
notes:
Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

name: Starchasm Nyx
notes:
Blue & Cold

If picking HoD minion.

Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

name: Stygian Nymph
notes:
Can pick Griseo's signet Yellow & Warm for more damage.

Hua

Pick when there' not enough breach from Kevin signets.

name: Twilight Paladin
notes:
If Blessing of Banishment is picked, pick Kevin's signet Mask of the Predator to supplement breach.

Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames

If lacking breach.

Mobius

Can equip Siegfried M to reduce cross cooldown.

name: Valkyrie Bladestrike
notes:
If there' a Normal Signet of Deliverance +2 stage effect, start with Kevin sigents.

Shining Like Stars (Nexus), Burning Like Flames
